ygData.subject: weekly gathering...
ygData.msgSnippet: i have been getting positive feedback about having a weekly gathering at the swashbucklers cave in east commons(also entrance to it from north ro). the one
ygData.messageBody:
i have been getting positive feedback about having a weekly gathering at the
swashbucklers cave in east commons(also entrance to it from north ro). the
one change is to have it on sundays instead. most of the feedback i have
been getting is saying that more people could make it on a sunday, instead
of a saturday. so unless there is another big event being planned on a
specific sunday(*see below for details), from now on i propose to have a
trade festival every sunday at 12 EST from now on.

purpose of the trade festival:

-MAIN PURPOSE-
1)to buy and sell our wares. looking for a smith making banded? selling your
handcrafted bows? trying to sell that polished tomahawk at top dollar?
rubicite leggings? LJ tunics? bone armor? bring your rare and handcrafted
items.

-OTHER POSSIBILITIES-
2)for guilds to possibly talk about themselves and invite other playes to
become members.

3)have language lessons.

4)have rich players or guilds sponsor events with prizes.

this will only take off if we let others know about it. so spread the word
to all your friends, and to others while on line. every sunday at the
swashbucklers cave at noon EST.


*there is one big event that is happening on Bristlebane on sunday the 13th.
it is the Enlightenment Gathering. here are the details.

WHAT: Enlightenment Gathering
WHEN: Sunday, June 13th 3:00 PM Pacific (5:00 PM Central)
WHERE: The Ever-Popular Tunnel to North Ro Desert in the East Commonlands
WHO: All races and classes are welcomed
SERVER: Bristlebane
EVENTS:
Philosophy Discussion
Trade Discussion
Language Lessons
Low Level Scavenger Hunt
Open Market

This is a ROLE-PLAYING EVENT. On that note the only requirement is that
there
is to be no fighting or duels. This is an event to expand the mind and not
to
lower the participants to the depths of violence and war.

For those who wish to participate in the Philosophy Discussion please read
the
documents on the web page below, from the current response it will be a
large
topic of the discussion.

We are in need of people to share the language of their race. Anyone who
would
help share their language please contact us. (The normal languages, like
Halfling, Ogre, Barbarian, and the like are what we are looking for.)

We are also in need people who wish to speak about their trade. Anyone who
would help share their knowledge of a trade please contact us. (Anyone
hosting
a trade discussion will have the market on selling their trade items at the
gathering ;) )

There will be a group lead from Qeynos to Freeport on Saturday. We will
advertise in Qeynos at 10:00 AM Pacific (12:00 AM Central) and try to leave
about 11:00 AM Pacific (12:00 PM Central). There may be another escort on
Sunday depending on demand.

For more information go to http://www.stonepool.com/hands . Contact us at
weeze@... or message Gwynn the Enchantress on Bristlebane.


thank you for taking the time to read all of this. and thank you for your
support.


_______________________________________________________________
